de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist

Class JavassistMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.JavassistMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="javassist",
      defaultPhase=PROCESS_CLASSES,
      requiresDependencyResolution=COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
public class JavassistMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Maven plugin that will apply Javassist class transformations on compiled classes (bytecode instrumentation).

    The real modifications of the bytecode are performed by one or more instances of the configured IClassTransformer.

    Example plugin configuration : 

     ...
 <configuration>
   <includeTestClasses>false</includeTestClasses>
   <buildDir>bin/classes</buildDir>
   <testBuildDir>bin/test-classes</testBuildDir>
   <transformerClasses>
     <transformerClass>
      <className>
       de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.example.transformer.MethodCallClassTransformer
      </className>
     </transformerClass>
   </transformerClasses>
 </configuration>
 ...
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • buildDir

        @Parameter(defaultValue="target/classes",
           property="javassist.buildDir",
           required=false)
private String buildDir
        Allows to customize the build directory of the project, used for both finding classes to transform and output them once transformed.

        The path must be either absolute or relative to project base directory. 

         ...
 <configuration>
   <buildDir>bin/classes</buildDir>
 </configuration>
 ...

      • testBuildDir

        @Parameter(defaultValue="target/test-classes",
           property="javassist.testBuildDir",
           required=false)
private String testBuildDir
        Allows to customize the build directory of the tests of the project, used for both finding classes to transform and output them once transformed.

        The path must be either absolute or relative to project base directory. 

         ...
 <configuration>
   <testBuildDir>bin/test-classes</testBuildDir>
 </configuration>
 ...

      • instantiateTransformerClasses

        protected javassist.build.IClassTransformer[] instantiateTransformerClasses(ClassLoader contextClassLoader,
                                                                ClassTransformerConfiguration... transformerClasses)
                                                                     throws Exception
        Instantiates and configures the passed transformer classes.
        Parameters:
        contextClassLoader - maybe null
        transformerClasses - maybe null
        Returns:
        array of passed transformer class name instances and never null but maybe empty.
        Throws:
        Exception - by instantiateTransformerClass(ClassLoader, ClassTransformerConfiguration) and configureTransformerInstance(IClassTransformer, Properties)
        See Also:
        instantiateTransformerClass(ClassLoader, ClassTransformerConfiguration), configureTransformerInstance(IClassTransformer, Properties)

      • instantiateTransformerClass

        protected javassist.build.IClassTransformer instantiateTransformerClass(ClassLoader contextClassLoader,
                                                            ClassTransformerConfiguration transformerClass)
                                                                 throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                        InstantiationException,
                                                                        IllegalAccessException,
                                                                        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Instantiate the class passed by ClassTransformerConfiguration configuration object.
        Parameters:
        contextClassLoader - maybe null
        transformerClass - must not be null
        Returns:
        new instance of passed transformer class name and never null
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - by transformerClass Class.forName(String).
        InstantiationException - by transformerClass Class.forName(String).
        IllegalAccessException - by transformerClass Class.forName(String).
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if passed transformerClass is null or invalid
        See Also:
        Class.forName(String, boolean, ClassLoader)
